item.title: 9-year-old dies after incident at Hersheypark's water park, CEO says
item.description: A 9-year-old child has died after an incident at The Boardwalk water park at Hersheypark in Hershey, Pennsylvania, on Thursday.

item.title: Man falls to his death during Oasis concert in London
item.description: Oasis said that its members are "shocked and saddened" after a man fell to his death during a concert by the band at London's Wembley Stadium.

item.title: Texas Democratic legislators flee state to protest GOP's redistricting plan
item.description: Texas Democrats fled the state Sunday, aiming to delay a plan to redraw the state's congressional map and give the GOP a bigger edge â€” an idea blessed...

item.title: Dozens dead, dozens more missing after migrant boat sinks off Yemen
item.description: At least 76 people have been killed and dozens are missing after a boat carrying mostly Ethiopian migrants sank off Yemen in the latest tragedy on the...

item.title: New Medicaid federal work requirements mean less leeway for states
item.description: More than a dozen states are seeking their own versions of Medicaid work requirements. But the incoming new federal standards pose new questions.
